info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal

Class TaskRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal.GoalRule
      • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal.TaskRule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoAllTasksRule, DoAnyTaskRule

    @Entity
public abstract class TaskRule
extends GoalRule
    A TaskRule defines the combination of tasks until a goal is fulfilled. So for a defined sample of tasks either all of them have to be fulfilled (type: DoAllTaskRule) which corresponds an AND-expression, or only one of a specific selection, which is like an OR-expression (type: DoAnyTaskRule).

    • Method Detail

      • getTasks

        public List<Task> getTasks()
        Gets the List of tasks which are contained in the goal rule definition. The specific rule is defined by the use DoALlTasksRule or DoAnyTaskRule.
        Returns:
        A list of tasks which are needed in goal rule's deifnition.

      • setTasks

        public void setTasks(List<Task> tasks)
        Sets the List of tasks which are contained in the goal rule's definition. The specific rule is defined by the use DoALlTasksRule or DoAnyTaskRule.
        Parameters:
        tasks - The list of tasks which are needed for the definition.

      • addTasks

        public void addTasks(List<Task> tasks)
        Adds one or more tasks to the list of tasks of a rule definition.
        Parameters:
        tasks - The list of tasks which are added to the rule's list of tasks.

      • addTask

        public void addTask(Task task)
        Adds only one task to the list of tasks of a rule definition.
        Parameters:
        task - The task which is added to the rule's list of task.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Task task)
        This method checks if a rule contains a specific task. If the task is defined in the rule it returns true otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        task - The task which has to be checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean value if the task is contained in the task rule (true) or not (false).

      • getProgress

        public abstract Progress getProgress(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                                     LocalDateTime lastDate)
        Abstract method to get the progress of a TaskRule. Dependent on the type of rule another value is returned.
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The list of finished tasks a player has already completed to check which are needed for the rule.
        lastDate - The date after all tasks are checked if they were completed in this period of time.
        Returns:
        The progress of the rule dependent on it's type different values of the progress are returned.

      • checkRule

        public abstract boolean checkRule(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                                  LocalDateTime lastDate)
        This rule checks if a rule is fulfilled. If it does true is returned otherwise false. Dependent on the type of rule this check is different.
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The list of already finished tasks a player has already completed.
        lastDate - The date a player has done a task. All dates after the passed date are checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean value if a rule is fulfilled (true) or not(false).

      • logTaskRuleDetails

        public static void logTaskRuleDetails(String type,
                                      String apiKey,
                                      String name,
                                      String description,
                                      String taskIds)
